text: The Crazy World of Julius Vrooder is a 1974 American drama movie directed by Arthur Hiller and starring Timothy Bottoms, Barbara Hershey, George Marshall, Lawrence Pressman. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Arthur Hiller Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies about psychiatry
title: The Crazy World of Julius Vrooder
